item.title: EP 709 - The McAfee Mystery: Murder, Suicide, Or An Interdimensional Jail Break?
item.itunes:title: The McAfee Mystery: Murder, Suicide, Or An Interdimensional Jail Break?
item.description:
Today we explore the tragic mystery of John McAfee, and then we see a UFO . . . or is it a dragon?!

 

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

“Alien Flyer” By TVP VT U

https://imgur.com/gallery/aPN1Fnw

 

Links:

EP 74 - Runescape .NYC (Quantum Immortality episode)

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-74-runescape-nyc

EP 706 - The Screaming Cave (Four Ghosts And An Alien episode)

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-706-the-screaming-cave

EP 287 - The Weirdest Alien Invasion Ever: The Casa Blanca Case

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-287-the-weirdest-alien-invasion-ever-the-casa-blanca-case

Report Sheds New Light on McAfee Death

https://www.newser.com/story/308122/report-mcafee-tried-to-kill-himself-in-february.html

Antivirus mogul John McAfee's wife says she doesn't believe he died by suicide

https://www.businessinsider.com/john-mcafee-wife-doesnt-believe-suicide-2021-7

Chapter 11 Genetic Factors and Suicidal Behavior

https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/books/NBK107191/

'HAUNTED FOR YEARS' John McAfee was blamed for neighbor’s 2012 death and his victim’s family now says ‘threat has come to an end’

https://www.the-sun.com/news/3157097/john-mcafee-neighbor-greg-faull-death-family-speak/

DANGEROUS LOVE John McAfee’s ex-prostitute wife Janice reveals how she was ordered to poison him after he left jungle harem of 7 women

https://www.the-sun.com/news/3149671/john-mcafee-wife-janice-prostitute-kidnap-poison-cartel/

1972 Sightings (Scottish Dragon story)

https://www.thinkaboutitdocs.com/category/sightings-by-date/1950-1999-sightings/1972-sightings/

Terry Barrett Band "Dangerous Conversation" from the Crooked River Groove taping

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Jr4UmkE6Q3s&ab_channel=crookedrivergroove

The Terry Barrett Band

https://www.reverbnation.com/tbarrett

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

Thanks to Chris K, Founder Of The Golden Rabbit Brigade

Dead Rabbit Archivist Some Weirdo On Twitter AKA Jack

YouTube Champ Stewart Meatball

The Haunted Mic Arm provided by Chyme Chili

Pintrest https://www.pinterest.com/basque5150/jason-carpenter-hood-river/

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@deadrabbitradio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2021
